page.title: 15LAW&ORDER RAFFORD AREA
page.content: The Rafford area is very law abiding and there were no serious crimes last year in Rafford.There is no permanent police station in Rafford but every morning police cars go to the area and they have accasional speed traps.On Friday 21st June there was a bush fire in the Rafford area and the police had to attend. Only one fire engine went to the fire. The fire started when they were burning sticks on Thursday and then the fire restarted. The most frequent incidents are traffic offences and the only vandalisism is breaking of windows. The bad spots on the road are the many blind bends and the narrowness of the road is also a hazard. The police are often called out in the winter when the roads easily become blocked by drifting snow and many houses can become cut off.
